subject: Replacement gas pedal
description_text: Hi I recently purchased the Simsonn Plus X pedal and the wire for the gas pedal snapped apart. Could I purchase a replacement gas pedal?

conversations.body_text: Hi Cpt Bagels,  We will release a new software version today, which will officially add support for the HS Pro calibration page.  Please update the software and try it out.

Hi Cpt Bagels,  The throttle connector can be taken to a local computer repair shop and re-crimped according to the brake wiring sequence. It’s a very simple process. The connector is indeed an RJ11 4P4C plug.
Hi, I took it to a few local shops and they said they wouldn’t be able to repair it. Can I just purchase a new gas pedal?
Hi Cpt Bagels,  Please provide your order number, contact name, phone number, and shipping address. We will send you a throttle pressure sensor replacement, which you can install manually.
Order Number: SSN4219  Name: Brandon Le  Number: 510-890-9411  Shipping Address: 8590 Windsor Point Way  Elk Grove, CA 95624
Hi Cpt Bagels,    I apologize for not getting back to you sooner. Here is your shipping tracking link.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047241768212
